item.title: Keynote: Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones - Simon Wardley
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: This is the third talk I’ve found worthy of publishing in the Awesome Talks series. Enjoy Simon Wardley’s Researcher, Leading Edge Forum, keynote from KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Europe 2018 called «Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones». Simon’s presentation technique, flair and master of language is flat out impressive — and fun! Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones https://youtu.be/xlNYYy8pzB4 Now, do you know what a map is? Do you, really?
